job.title: Software Engineer Mobile (React)
job.description: ltpgtour confidential venturebacked growth client is hiring a senior mobile engineer react native who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience robust experience translating design into code and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers designers and product managers to build amazing apps position is fulltime either in nyc chicago la sf or portland and will report to the manager of mobile engineeringltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtcollaborate with product managers designers and backend engineers to design and deliver highquality products on ios and androidltligtltligtbuild efficient and reusable ui components and architect reliable performant and maintainable solutionsltligtltligtlead teams that continuously build ship learn and iterateltligtltligtdrive technical innovation processes and best practices required to deliver bestinclass mobile applicationsltligtltligtmentor and develop a highperforming team of engineersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtyou have at least years of experience building mobile applicationsltligtltligtyou have used react native to build crossplatform mobile applicationsltligtltligtyou are comfortable working with javascripttypescript but also not afraid to jump into swift or kotlin as neededltligtltligtyou have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industryltligtltligtyou have a strong understanding of uxui concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibilityltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtpreferred qualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexperience working with bitcoin ethereum andor blockchain technology a huge plusltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtonce you apply well send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership teamltpgt
